Instructions:
**Alpha**: A, B, T, W, C, H
**Email**: alexis.flores@arrow.com

**Alpha**: I, J, K, E, F, #, signs, D, Q, U, V, X, Y, Z
**Email**: iliana.robles@arrow.com
Rationale: Handles Special Chars and Alpha Group I-Z.

Instructions:
**Alpha**: L, P, M, N, O, R, G
**Email**: valeria.sanchez@arrow.com

1. Search order/SO number in 'Digital Customer' Tab on SWB to see notes, vendor name, status, and internal tracking.\n2. Search order number in Salesforce to review cases handled by Support/OMT.\n3. For Supplier orders, search the PO number in Salesforce.
Rationale: Determining if an inquiry is already being handled and locating internal tracking.

Instructions:
1. Open Digital Customer section from Customer Tab.
2. Search order with WEB SO or SO number.
3. Click on the order line to view OMT action notes.
4. Coordinate with appropriate teams; note that alert releases cannot be expedited.
Rationale: Determining why an order is held by OMT and the policy on expedition.

Instructions:
1. Go to ETQ Portal > All Modules > eRequests.
2. New Document > Warehouse Requests > 'Sure Ship Domestic - Draft'.
3. Select Warehouse Code (e.g., V72).
4. Fill mandatory fields (Host is always 'AC Prod').
5. Enter Sales Order number, Delivery ID, and Pick Status note.
6. Click 'Send'.
Rationale: Expediting Reno warehouse orders 'Released to Warehouse' or 'Picked' for > 2 days.

Instructions:
1. Go to ETQ Portal > All Modules > eRequests.
2. New Document > Warehouse Requests > 'Receiving Expedite - Draft'.
3. Fill mandatory fields: Supplier PO, Carrier, Tracking Number, and Date of Arrival.
4. Use carrier portal to verify delivery.
5. If the DHL 'Signed By' name is unknown, use 'N/A'.
Rationale: Items delivered to Reno but showing as 'Awaiting Receipt' for > 3 days.

Instructions: 1. Open a Salesforce Case: 'Expedite Receiving [Supplier PO] / SO[NUM]'.\n2. Send an email to URGENTRECEIVING.HK@arrowasia.com.\n3. Provide mandatory data: Supplier PO, Sales Order, Supplier, Tracking Number, Carrier, Date of Arrival, MPN, and Qty.
Rationale: Hong Kong items delivered but stuck in 'Awaiting Receipt' for > 3 days.

Instructions:
1. For warehouse V90 requests, email verical-logistics@verical.com (CC: amunoz@arrow.com, jawells@arrow.com).
2. Use Template:
Hello Team
Could you please provide MFG CoC for:
WEB-SO:
PO:
Delivery ID#:
MPN:
Line#:
Regards
Rationale: Email template and contact list for Nogales warehouse documentation.

Instructions: 1. Go to MyConnect Portal > 'Report a Digital Issue'.\n2. Required: URL/Link, Screenshot of error, WEB-SO number, and User Email address.
Rationale: Reporting technical errors or bugs on Arrow.com or Verical.com.

Instructions: 1. Go to MyConnect Portal > 'Warehouse IT Support - WMS'.\n2. Use for: Packing list reprint errors, SWB printer issues, and label reprinting problems.
Rationale: Technical errors regarding warehouse management and shipping systems.

Instructions:
1. Identify unpaid order in AP report.
2. Research if supplier shipped without approval or if a credit memo is possible.
3. Create new SO with exact same info as original.
4. Update Resale to $0.00.
5. Remove Freight charges.
6. Place on manual header hold: 'Replacement SO; reaching out to [SUPPLIER] for PO Cancellation'.
Rationale: Paying 3rd party suppliers when the original sales order cannot be billed.

Instructions:
1. Wait 30 mins for Dropship PO# to generate in SWB (Info > Drop Ship).
2. Email AP (Subject: Dropship Order D[NUM] - Please confirm receipt).
3. Body: 'Hello - Please confirm receipt of replacement Dropship Order D[NUM] to pay [SUPPLIER] for Invoice #[INV].'
4. Email 3rd party POC (Waldom: Kellys@waldom.com / Air Electro: LBuckley@airelectro.com) to cancel original PO.
Rationale: Finalizing payment and cancelling the redundant original order.

Instructions: 1. Reno [VXX] Packing List: https://wms-prod.arrow.com/PAWMSReprints/\n2. Non-Military CoC: https://arrow.tfaforms.net/4865283\n3. Military Parts: arrowcrm.my.salesforce-sites.com/arrowservices
Rationale: Direct access links for warehouse documentation requests.
